title.narrative: F.a: Developing a Sign Language Course and Capacity Building of the Deaf

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to promote sign language and to advocate for the rights of deaf persons. The situation of the deaf in Palestine is very difficult and their rights are often not realized. Most deaf persons have not completed primary of seconda ry education. The amount of vocational education available in Palestine for the deaf is very low leading to increased unemployment. Attempts to improve the situation of the deaf are also difficult as the Palestinian Deaf Union has very low competence. Not a single university in Palestine offers sign language as part of their curriculum. As part of the project a sign language course has been established at Birzeit University in Birzeit near Ramallah, Palestine. The objective is to have the course as part of the accredited course selection. The direct beneficiaries of the project are the students and members of the deaf clubs who take part in either attending or teaching the course. The course is realized as a cooperation between Birzeit University and FELM.
